defs.docs: A build dependency for running `cmake` to build a native library

attributes.value: ! A build dependency for running `cmake` to build a native library
! This crate provides some necessary boilerplate and shim support for running
! the system `cmake` command to build a native library. It will add
! appropriate cflags for building code to link into Rust, handle cross
! compilation, and use the necessary generator for the platform being
! The builder-style configuration allows for various variables and such to be
! passed down into the build as well.
! // Builds the project in the directory located in `libfoo`, installing it

defs.name: Config
defs.docs: Builder style configuration for a pending CMake build.

attributes.value: / Builder style configuration for a pending CMake build.

defs.name: build
defs.docs:
Builds the native library rooted at `path` with the default cmake options.
 This will return the directory in which the library was installed.

attributes.value: / Builds the native library rooted at `path` with the default cmake options.
/ This will return the directory in which the library was installed.
/ // Builds the project in the directory located in `libfoo`, installing it

defs.name: new
defs.docs:
Creates a new blank set of configuration to build the project specified
 at the path `path`.

attributes.value: / Creates a new blank set of configuration to build the project specified

defs.docs: Sets the build-tool generator (`-G`) for this compilation.

defs.name: cflag
defs.docs:
Adds a custom flag to pass down to the C compiler, supplementing those
 that this library already passes.

attributes.value: / Adds a custom flag to pass down to the C compiler, supplementing those

Adds a custom flag to pass down to the C++ compiler, supplementing those

defs.value: fn <K, V> (&mut self, k: K, v: V) -> &mut Config
defs.docs: Adds a new `-D` flag to pass to cmake during the generation step.

attributes.value: / Adds a new `-D` flag to pass to cmake during the generation step.

defs.name: register_dep
defs.docs:
Registers a dependency for this compilation on the native library built
 by Cargo previously.

attributes.value: / Registers a dependency for this compilation on the native library built
/ This registration will modify the `CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH` environment
/ variable for the build system generation step.

defs.name: target
defs.docs: Sets the target triple for this compilation.

attributes.value: / Sets the target triple for this compilation.
/ This is automatically scraped from `$TARGET` which is set for Cargo
/ build scripts so it's not necessary to call this from a build script.

defs.name: no_build_target
defs.docs: Disables the cmake target option for this compilation.

attributes.value: / Disables the cmake target option for this compilation.
/ Note that this isn't related to the target triple passed to the compiler!

defs.name: host
defs.docs: Sets the host triple for this compilation.

attributes.value: / Sets the host triple for this compilation.
/ This is automatically scraped from `$HOST` which is set for Cargo
/ build scripts so it's not necessary to call this from a build script.

defs.name: out_dir
defs.docs: Sets the output directory for this compilation.

attributes.value: / Sets the output directory for this compilation.
/ This is automatically scraped from `$OUT_DIR` which is set for Cargo
/ build scripts so it's not necessary to call this from a build script.

defs.name: profile
defs.docs: Sets the `CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=build_type` variable.

attributes.value: / By default, this value is automatically inferred from Rust's compilation

defs.docs: Configures whether the /MT flag or the /MD flag will be passed to msvc build tools.

attributes.value: / Configures whether the /MT flag or the /MD flag will be passed to msvc build tools.
/ This option defaults to `false`, and affect only msvc targets.

defs.name: uses_cxx11
defs.docs:
Alters the default target triple on OSX to ensure that c++11 is
 available. Does not change the target triple if it is explicitly
 specified.

defs.name: always_configure
defs.docs: Forces CMake to always run before building the custom target.

attributes.value: / Forces CMake to always run before building the custom target.
/ In some cases, when you have a big project, you can disable
/ subsequents runs of cmake to make `cargo build` faster.
